thread.title: Things happen, its what you do next.
thread.title_full: Things happen, its what you do next. - Review of Archer Hotel New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: wendy t
title: Things happen, its what you do next.
text: My daughter and I had a hiccup the first morning for a 6:30-6:45 am breakfast delivery that did not come. Apologies all around and Yes we posted it on the door handle around 12 at night. We came down stairs to eat quickly, the staff was great and I believe the meal was compt, which I didn't ask for. After that, the staff continued to bend over back wards to make sure everything was perfect. We even received Charlie Palmer cookies, super nice but not necessary. I would also like you to know that Yomaries is fantastic at her job! She made us feel welcome (a couple of Gals from Montana) and made sure we were taken care of. She is the model example 'Hostess', we noticed and appreciated her dedication to the Hotel and its occupants.
